definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: I doubt that you have two brain cells to rub together-does that count?
sentences.chinese: 我懷疑你沒有兩個能融到一起的腦細胞，這算數麼？

sentences.english: Scientists say that working the body and mind at the same time revitalizes brain cells.
sentences.chinese: 科學家說，工作在同一時間，身體和精神賦活腦細胞。

sentences.english: Check for dead brain cells or something.
sentences.chinese: 檢查一下死的腦細胞什麼的。

sentences.english: Objective To study the changes of serum cytosolic enzyme in rat with cerebral ischemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大鼠腦缺血時腦細胞胞漿酶含量變化的影響。

sentences.english: And then the cells continue to change so that within a couple of days the body actually decomposes.
sentences.chinese: 然後腦細胞繼續變化，一兩天之內，身體開始腐爛。

sentences.english: How do scientists control brain cells with lasers?
sentences.chinese: 科學家們如何用激光控制腦細胞？

sentences.english: New brain cell development, improved cognition and memory.
sentences.chinese: 促進新的腦細胞發展，改善認識和記憶能力。

sentences.english: We simply don't let our brain cells hang around idly.
sentences.chinese: 我們根本就不能讓腦細胞閒下來。

sentences.english: Exercise stimulates the formation of new brain cells.
sentences.chinese: 運動會促進新的腦細胞的形成。

sentences.english: It is secreted by the brain cells in honeybees.
sentences.chinese: 在蜜蜂中褪黑素由其腦細胞進行分泌。

sentences.english: Old memories may get the boot from new brain cells.
sentences.chinese: 舊的記憶或許會被新的腦細胞掃地出門。

sentences.english: They discovered two enzymes that snip pieces from a large protein protruding from brain cells.
sentences.chinese: 他們發現兩種能把腦細胞突出蛋白質剪切成碎片的酶。

sentences.english: Scientists have shown that individual brain cells take 40 winks when we are tired - even while the rest of the brain is awake.
sentences.chinese: 科學家發現人在疲憊時部分腦細胞會打上一小會兒盹。

sentences.english: That allows scientists to monitor individual brain cells with great precision.
sentences.chinese: 這可以讓科學家很精確的監視單個大腦細胞。

sentences.english: I believe it's called oxygenating the brain cells.
sentences.chinese: 我相信它被叫做給氧於腦細胞。

sentences.english: The mechanism by which mental faculties cells store memories is not clearly understood.
sentences.chinese: 大腦細胞貯存追憶郭德綱機理並不爲情不自禁清楚。

definition: stress/abbr. for 應激反應|应激反应[ying4 ji1 fan3 ying4]
